=== Circle-strafing ===
* Defined as a gameplay strategy in which the player strafes in a circular motion around a target.

=== Exposed Weakspot ===
* Defined as a spot directly or indirectly attached to a body that is more-or-less constantly exposed. (e.g. an enemy's head).

=== Shrouded Weakspot ===
* Defined as a spot directly or indirectly attached to a body that is only exposed to a certain position relative to the weakspot (e.g. an enemy's backside).

=== Peakaboo Weakspot ===
* Defined as a spot directly or indirectly attached to a body that fluctuates between being exposed and unexposed.

=== Dynamic Weakspot ===

=== Auxiliary Weakspot ===
* Defined as a spot directly or indirectly attached to a body to act as a secondary, precursive, or supportive role

== GAMEPLAY ==
=== Mechanical Hinting ===
* Defined as a gameplay situation where the player is hinted information directly associated with gameplay mechanics.

=== Audible Hinting ===

=== Visual Hinting ===

=== Expositional Hinting ===

=== Solve to Proceed ===
* Defined as a gameplay situation where the player is either forced or incentivized to solve a puzzle of some kind to proceed further or achieve an outcome.

=== Activate to Proceed ===
* Defined as a gameplay situation where the player is either forced or incentivized to activate something in order to proceed further or achieve an outcome.

===== Search and Activate to Proceed =====
* Defined as a gameplay situation where the player is either forced or incentivized to search for whatever needs to be activated in order to proceed further or achieve an outcome.

=== Shoot Targets to Proceed ===
* Defined as a gameplay situation where the player is either forced or incentivized to shoot a set number of targets to proceed further or achieve an outcome.

==== Shoot and Climb to Proceed ====
* Defined as a gameplay situation where the player is either forced or incentivized shoot one or more targets to then climb something as a result to proceed or achieve an outcome.

=== Yield to Proceed ===
* Yield to proceed is defined as a gameplay situation where the player is either forced or incentivized yield and react properly to something to proceed further or achieve an outcome.

=== Out-of-box Option ===
* Out-of-box options are defined as situations where the player is either forced or incentivized to "think outside the box" to proceed or achieve an outcome.

=== Breadcrumbs ===
* Breadcrumbs are defined as what you leave behind either after doing an action (e.g. cartridge casings), or passively such as walking (e.g. footsteps).

=== Sound Emitters ===
* Sound emitters are defined as bodies that emit sound - typically in a context where that sound can be detected by other sound-sensitive bodies.

=== Sound Suppressors ===
* Sound suppressors are defined as bodies or mechanics that can suppress sounds - typically in a context where that sound can be detected by other sound-sensitive bodies.

=== Visual Receptors ===
* Visual receptors are defined as bodies or mechanics that can perceive strictly visual information (e.g. video cameras).

=== Sound Receptors ===
* Sound receptors are defined as bodies or mechanics that can perceive strictly audible information (e.g. microphones).

=== Dynamic Receptors ===
* Dynamic receptors are defined as bodies or mechanics that have a distinguishable ability to fluctuate their perceptibility (e.g. sleeping guards).
